website_summaries.verdict: Fun flamingo-shaped playset with 2 dolls. A complete tropical theme in a classic Polly Pocket compact.
pros: Lots of activities in a small design
The dolls can float in the pool, immerse in a waterfall, lounge by the hot tub, and jump off the diving board
The classic compact style is easy to slip into a bag as a travel toy
Parents and kids love the attention to detail
cons: Some parts fall off easily, including the flamingo's head

customer_reviews.title: The best of the new released Polly Pockets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the entire line of the new Polly Pockets and I have to say, this is the best of the bunch. It more closely resembles the older Polly Pockets of my day and has so many little compartments and cool features. The little flamingo floats are so freaking cute. My 3 year old loves this playset. And best of all, it’s travel friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Meh, okay, I guess?
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year old purchased this for my 3-year old as a Christmas gift. It was intended to keep my youngest busy during her siblings’ sporting events. The colors are bright and this seems like it should be fun... but there’s actually very little playing that can be done. While the size makes this product adorable, that’s kind of where it ends. Neither daughter played with this longer than five minutes before it was thrown to the side of the tree, never to be touched again.
customer_reviews.author: bioteacher101

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a birthday gift for my daughter. She loves it and spends hours at a time playing with it. It is very durable and my daughter loves all the different things it has included for her Polly Pocket to play/do.
customer_reviews.author: Sammielee711

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger set than the original Polly Pockets when I was a kid. Not sure the word Pocket should be on there anymore! My 6 year old seems to love it so far. I'm not a fan of the stickers that they stick on. I don't see that lasting very long. Our Polly Pickets had little indentions that they clicked into. That seems like a better idea. My 6 year old has trouble getting it to open and close. The flamingo does not stay clicked in very much. She also dropped it one time and it came apart. Luckily it went back together.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Not the original, but close enough to be fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy! The little dolls are probably twice as big as I remember the original Polly Pocket dolls, but they're still tiny enough to be fun. The world has a lot of places that the dolls can sit, stand, or hide. Their feet stick to the diving board, and the set comes with stickers that can go elsewhere that the doll feet also stick to. The floaty rings are a fun bonus. I wish there were more sets like this!
customer_reviews.author: V.ston

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of the Polly Pockets from years ago. Very nice, good size set with lots of cute details.
customer_reviews.author: B Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The new Polly Pockets are cheap compared to the 1990s originals. I attached a photo to compare. It's really terrible to reboot a beloved toy such as the Polly Pocket and diminish the quality. I hope that someone at Polly Pocket reads this review and takes it into consideration when continuing new product development -- as I am not the only customer that can see the obvious difference in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nitey Nite

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable. My daughter loves it. It is perfectly sized she can take it with her. There are these wonderful little stickers that initially she thought were decoration but they actually are little magnets I guess because they hold the little dolls in place making playing much easier. They are little rubber dolls so they could be bent and placed in the little chairs and floats. Great find and we will definitely buy others from the Big Pockets line.
customer_reviews.author: JJsMom

customer_reviews.title: Travels well
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our mature two year old daughter to be entertained on a road trip. It did an amazing job. Only dropped the small figurines a handful of times and screamed for them, but the amount of time it entertained was worth every minute.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler #OptOut

customer_reviews.title: One of my kid’s favorites
customer_reviews.text: My three year old adores this toy. I try to save it for situations where she needs to wait quietly— it is the perfect size to bring along to a restaurant or when traveling, and it keeps her quietly engaged for quite a while. This set is particularly nice in that it comes with two little dolls, and it has lots of little doors to open and close and elements to rotate and turn. It isn’t the sturdiest plastic, and sometimes the latch doesn’t stay shut which means that Polly and company get lost in my handbag, but otherwise this toy is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I'm an 80's kid so I grew up with the original PP. These are great quality and adorable - can't wait to give them to my DD for christmas! (I bought 4 different versions).
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made and I tried returning it but for some reason I wasn’t able to. I guess I should just toss it because it’s not going to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I had recently passed my extensive '90s Polly Pocket collection that I saved to my 4 year old and they all held up so well and she LOVES them so I was really excited to see new ones to get her but these...these are not the same. It doesn't stay up on its own and feels very flimsy. She keeps getting sad they she broke it but she definitely did not, it is cheap and cheesy especially next to its original counterpart. I had planned to buy more to have on hand as a surprise gift every so often but not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schoellner

customer_reviews.title: Not Suitable for Use in Water as Shown
customer_reviews.text: Polly Pockets were one of my favorite toys growing up so I was excited to purchase this set for my niece. I thought she'd enjoyed them as much as I did and she loves flamingos, so it seemed like a great gift. However, the case doesn't hold water very well unlike what's shown in the photos, so the dolls and accessories didn't float. My niece was disappointed and overall unimpressed with the toy. I was a bit disappointed with the quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the Lake Placid

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun!
customer_reviews.text: It's cute! My daughter loves little things to play with and this was awesome. It came with everything in the picture. She plays with it almost daily and we have had it a couple months. I would say it is well worth it. She uses her imagination and incorporate other little toys with it and I will be definitely buying more of these for a surprise later on.
customer_reviews.author: LaLA

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and my little four year old broke it just trying to open it the second day.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Polly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my friends daughter since I refuse to buy the lame toys that are out now a days. I had to keep it old school, when toys were actually fun and kept you entertained for more than 60 seconds. Was a huge hit for the birthday girl and my other friends kids have been asking for Polly pockets now, too. These may be my go to gift now.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars I would; this was delivered yesterday and it already broke!! The quality is nothing compared to how they use to make these. It won’t even stay open or upright for kids to be able to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: 80s kid needed this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter but really it was for me lol she loved it and thought it was super cool. She loves tiny tiny stuff. They also stand now that was weird for me to see but loved it when we started playing. PS I use my husband's account so it looks like he's a 12 yr old girl reviewing products. Oops lol
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R. Sutphin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter was super excited for this gift. It came with little stickies to put on the feet and to place in places you want polly to stand at. Great quality and exactly as described. Easy to close and carry around while traveling or in the car. Will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: mz.dodge

customer_reviews.title: My daughter says 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved theses they are tiny so you need to make sure you have them in a special place when not playing with them but they are cute and even small seem very durable. She has been playing with them and loves them still. Great value and last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter loves this toy. For the price, it was worth it to make her happy. She has played with it a lot and it's in good condition. Nothing has broken off or been lost. Quite enjoyable for her and her friends to play.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Cute Polly Pocket
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what you see. It's cute, small, easy to handle and assemble and my granddaughers play for hours with these little dolls. I wouldn't recommend for any child who loves putting small pieces in their mouths. For the right child, these help with imaginative play and creative thinking!
customer_reviews.author: Therese A D Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my four yr old and she didn't know what to do with it. It's cute, but the dolls didn't fit in the cute swan floaties, or sit in the deck chairs or fit in the cupboards. I don't know why there is a wave maker. No, just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend's daughter ... oh she loved it . she played with it one time . it was easy to use stick the stickers all around .the characters are small so advisable for older as it describes .
customer_reviews.author: JGabby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter to take in the car so she wouldn't get bored. It's so cute, and small, and the pieces all just close up inside. It's perfect to have handy for her.
customer_reviews.author: MamaC

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my friends daughter and she loved them! She was so excited to play with her polly pocket! I really liked how she came with stickers that polly will stick to so you can put her somewhere and she will actually stay!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy they brought polly pocket back
customer_reviews.text: My girls love the polly pocket sets. These particular sets are nicer and easier to play with then the smaller sets. They love the little accessories and hidden compartments.
customer_reviews.author: EmMP.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set is bigger than I had expected. It’s very nicely packaged. The dogs are really teeny not quite what I was expecting with Polly pockets but it looks like a great and fun toy
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not the same...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this for my daughter because I loved Polly pockets as a kid. Unfortunately they have changed quite a bit. They stand on sticky tabs and the dolls don’t sit in the chairs. My daughter ripped one of the dolls slightly when she tried to move it from one sticky tab to the next.
customer_reviews.author: NeonPanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun but water feature is weak.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute compact. Doesn’t hold enough water to actually float the flamingo or “make waves” as it says it does but it’s fun and my girls are thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Coviello

customer_reviews.title: Opened at Christmas, hasn’t played with since!
customer_reviews.text: I had Polly Pockets when I was a kid and loved them! I bought this specifically for nostalgia and because I wanted my daughter to love them too! Realistically, this is another piece of plastic that will end up in the giveaway bag.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to see that the Polly Pocket compacts have been brought back. I bought this to compare to my old Bluebird Polly pocket compacts and I am very pleased with it. The figures are very nice and should not break as easily as the old ones with the hinge at the waist. I bought another for my daughter and she loves it. Overall we are really enjoying these, I love that I can share a this small part of my childhood with my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Klaire Kate

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun with FLAMINGOS
customer_reviews.text: Was the biggest little gift there was. Our daughter just loved all the flamingo items in this FLAMINGO Polly Pocket. She laughed and smiled for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: MissyP

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it. I purchased this through the Amazon Warehouse and it was as described with only slight damage to packaging. I was delighted with the value I received.
customer_reviews.author: dlk

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap not the sturdy construction of the original Polly pockets. We bought this one and the cupcake one and this one the hinge does not hold up my daughter has to prop something behind it to keep it standing up otherwise it falls over.
customer_reviews.author: BMP

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift!
customer_reviews.text: I love these just as much now, as I did when I was a kid. I actually like the current Polly pocket dolls more since they have the gummy-like doll. My daughter loves it! Got it for her third birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So fun! My 9 year old loves this new generation Polly pockets! And honestly I’m a little jealous. Haha! They are so much cooler than when I was her age. Having the feet grip the stickers is genius, and the accessories are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashmm18

customer_reviews.title: Larger than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! Bought it as a gift for my daughter, I used to love Polly Pockets when I was a little girl. I was surprised with how well made it is and how large it is. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Xmas hit!
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of the Polly's I played with as a kid only better. My girls loved these! Plastic is good quality and lots of activities in the playset.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Volk

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love how the dolls stand on the little stickers so cute! My daughter love that its a flamingo. I love that its a great self contained car/travel toy!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for Christmas and looooooves it. I bought it for the nostalgia from my childhood but it turned out to be the highlight of her Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color and very cute
customer_reviews.text: She loved it but it was pretty flimsy where the head came out that you used to open kept falling off. I bought a similar one without the bird head closure.
customer_reviews.author: LaVerne Harvey

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my five year old niece who requested it for her sixth birthday. She loves it. It is very cute but I do think that the loose items They are so tiny. Understandably because this is poly pocket, But they are very easy to lose. I know you can put them in the case and secure them, But just wondering if you could make some of your products a little bit larger
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Baumgarten

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because I thought these were the same Polly pockets that I used to play with when I was a child. They’re not. Not even close to being as cool as those. Would not suggest to buy. I will not buy again. So sad
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: The toys can be stored inside of the case great idea!
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice to be able to store everything inside and close it up and have it all contained for the granddaughters. When they want to open it up and play with them again it’s all there.
customer_reviews.author: lulut36

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for daughter!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter and she absolutely loved it and couldn’t stop playing with it! She loves that real water can also go in to play with it. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: So much bigger and nicer than expected! It hasn't been opened as yet, as I'm giving it to my daughter for Christmas, but from what I can see, it looks well made and very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: broken out of package
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my daughter. It was broken out of the package. Unfortunately the return window has closed because I bought the present several weeks early. I'd like to have another mailed to me.
customer_reviews.author: starwars12

customer_reviews.title: My 3 years old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Reminded me of the poly pockets I had as a kid and loved. My three year old loves it. Any younger than 3 and the pieces would be too small for them. Overall really fun and quiet toy.
customer_reviews.author: Darvillamarvil

customer_reviews.title: Our niece loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our niece for her birthday. I thought the little dolls were going to be hard and plastic but they weren't as durable as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony and Britany Cunha

customer_reviews.title: They back! Or did they ever leave
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe these are back! Maybe they never left! My daughter loved playing with these when she was a little girl! Fast forward! She’s getting one for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

customer_reviews.title: Good bought.
customer_reviews.text: This house has good platmass quality. Vivid colors. It seems to me that these sets are ideal for travel. They have little space.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Bad doll design
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were like the original Polly pockets. These ones are gel like and break instantly with one tug. Waste of money when the doll breaks first hour.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great price larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas because I had one as a child and loved it! But I remember mine being small this is actually very impressive
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Silvers

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Was very suprised they still made Polly Pocket items, so I was glad I could share a little bit of the 90s with my neice.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Already opened product
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this for my daughters birthday because I remember Polly pocket! I purchased this end of August and I’m just getting my daughters birthday stuff together now to realize this was an already opened package. I’m sure everything is fine, but that is really disappointing. The whole back is falling off and pieces have fallen down inside the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Griffith

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this playset and I love how nostalgic it is!! The pieces are so tiny just like they used to be. Happy to see these adorable toys coming back
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very cute set
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loved this set. It kept her interest for a long time. Of course we monitored her closed due the small parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polly Pockets are Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter because her friend had one, so she HAD to have one to. She loves it, and I now got her more for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: nicole merriman

customer_reviews.title: Classic toy that your kids can enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not going to lie! I’m a grown ass adult and I bought this for my daughter who knows nothing about Polly pocket because these were my jammm when I was a kid
customer_reviews.author: Kylepluse

customer_reviews.title: cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: This item is darling. It's compact but has a lot in it for a little thing. My daughter was overjoyed with it. And the discount price, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: SeptGirl

customer_reviews.title: Falls over
customer_reviews.text: Overall my girls love playing with it. The problem is the clam shell doesn’t stay with the lid in the vertical position. If you open it up it is so heavy it just falls backward. Either need to tighten the hinge and put more weight on the bottom or create some sort of stand.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for 4 year-old Niece, She Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Great value for my money. Perfect toy for a little girl. A little top-heavy and has a difficult time staying up but would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old approved! Cute toy. Still like the vintage ones from the 90’s better but that’s just me lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really is pocket size
customer_reviews.text: this is a great toy for a girl but not for any child under six because the pieces are super small but really cute my granddaughter is going to really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge fan of the original PP when I was young, so I was ECSTATIC when these came back out. These are a touch different, but I’m very pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: G's mama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! Bought for my 5 yr old granddaughter and she loves it.. so compact for travel .. the little people in it so cute and sticks to surface where u want it
customer_reviews.author: bea

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I had one when I was little and just had to buy one for my daughter. It is super cute. Comes with stickers that you attach to the plastic and then the little Polly stays on the sticker easier
customer_reviews.author: Grmngrl

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it wants to play with it all the time. My only complaint is that the flamingo head tends to fall off if the case is dropped.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Very cute  - gave as gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter for her birthday. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G.

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the purchase. The child I bought it for thought it was cute and fun to play with!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Reminds me of my childhood and my niece loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts for girls
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and niece loved getting these. They love the the details they have.
customer_reviews.author: billie jean lentsch

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it, super cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute model, got delivered without issues. My daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: cute and she loved playing with .fast shipper and a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: paint scratched
customer_reviews.text: Cute set but the paint was scratched off on parts. My 5 year old daughter doesn't really care, but the quality is not great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fun playset, nice dolls
customer_reviews.text: Love the dolls, better than the original. Cute play scene.
customer_reviews.author: Howsy

customer_reviews.title: Fun girls toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. The polly pocket dolls included have sticky stretchy legs so they can stick to the surface and stand up without falling over. She had fun with this toy. Now its in the toy box.
customer_reviews.author: chandiz

customer_reviews.title: Good on the go !
customer_reviews.text: Was given to a little girl who is crazy about flamingos 🦩 and she LOVED IT! Didn’t let go all night and it’s a first thing to takes on the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Koroleva

customer_reviews.title: Opened and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Bought thinking I would get a new item but it’s clearly been opened and is missing piceces. My fault for not checking as soon as it was delivered but this is a Christmas gift and now I’m stuck without it because obviously not gifting an item that has been opened and not complete.
customer_reviews.author: TLMiller

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves it. Perfect for her little hands and not so breakable

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my niece and she loved it!no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Pocket Toy - Great for Travelling
customer_reviews.text: So adorable, my daughter loves playing with these tiny dolls. I would say this toy is appropriate for children over the age of 4. Unless your 4yo still puts things in their mouths then wait another year when their 5.
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable for any Polly Pocket fan! My grandduaghter loves flamingos and Polly Pocket, so this was a win-win for her.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, my girls even share it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters (3 and 9) love to play with these Polly Pockets. Theu share and have a bunch of fun together.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bottum93

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, being a poly pocket fan myself I enjoyed watching my daughter play with this! She loves it

customer_reviews.title: great gift item at an affordable price; thank you!
customer_reviews.text: It's new and affordable and cute as a gift at the last min. for xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lansing Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. Has little spots where the dolls can stand up on their own. You can add stickers (included) so that dolls can stand wherever you want. Fun, kept daughter busy in car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this. Falls can stand without support on the stickers provided

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t use the water as in description says
customer_reviews.text: Good but you can’t use with water as description says.
customer_reviews.author: Patrycja

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Seven year old daughter loved it in her Easter basket !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Flamingo is adorable
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 8 yr old granddaughter, she really loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Grandma P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & value for $9.99, perfect bday present for my 9yo girl.
customer_reviews.text: Super detailed and very cute. My daughter loved this for her 9th birthday! Great value for $9.99
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (3 and 4) love these! They play with them for such a long time, unlike alit if their other toys. They remind me of when I used to play with Polly pockets when I was a little girl and I like sharing that with them.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived open and damaged
customer_reviews.text: Plastic covering item was intentionally opened. Looked like the item was damaged by getting crushed somehow, scrapes and dents on it. Put it right back in box and returned.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't latch
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Didn't latch properly and small items kept falling out.

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: i remember old polly pocket by blue bird, these look great, their rubber legs make them adorable

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Brought me back to when my kids were little. My niece is going to love it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece LOVED this. Super good gift for girls age 7-9!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Polly Pocket Pocket World Flamingo Floatie Compact with Surprise Reveals, Micro Dolls & Accessories [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description: It time to make a splash with the Polly Pocket Pocket World Flamingo Floatie Compact! Shaped like a pink flamingo, the compact opens to a themed world complete with water area to float in, hot tub with chairs to hang out, tropical waterfall area, diving board and Polly and Lila dolls. The compact also features secret reveals: turn the flamingo neck to create a wave pool; flip the purple area with towel to reveal a hot tub; open a door to reveal a changing area; and open another door to peek into Polly doll's bedroom. Polly and Lila dolls each have their own floaties to float in the pool, and in the waterfall area, you can place Polly or Lila in the actual waterfall and turn it so they are really immersed in the waterfall! The Flamingo Floatie compact is small enough to take anywhere, anytime for the splashiest of Polly Pocket adventures. Includes Polly Pocket Pocket World Flamingo Floatie Compact with secret reveals, micro Polly and Lila dolls, two floaties and a sticker sheet. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Shaped like a pink flamingo, the Polly Pocket Pocket World Flamingo Floatie Compact opens to a themed world that is the splashiest of fun featuring Polly and Lila dolls, a water area to float in, hot tub with chairs to hang out, tropical waterfall area and diving board.

Compact also features secret reveals: turn the flamingo neck to create a wave pool; flip the purple area with towel to reveal a hot tub; open a door to reveal a changing area; and open another door to peek into Polly doll's bedroom.
Polly and Lila dolls each have their own floaties to float in the pool.
In the waterfall area, place Polly or Lila in the actual waterfall and turn it so they are really immersed in the waterfall!
The Flamingo Floatie compact is small enough to take anywhere, anytime for the splashiest of Polly Pocket adventures.
​Includes Polly Pocket Pocket World Flamingo Floatie Compact with secret reveals, micro Polly and Lila dolls, two floaties and a sticker sheet.
